name: God Does Not Play Dice
description:
This is my first shitty game made for Beginners Circle #3 during the past 2 weeks! DON'T LEAVE WITHOUT GIVING A PROPER FEEDBACK!

God Does Not Play Dice is a simple golf-like game, where you play as “GOD”. You have just created a universe and you are bored. So to pass time, you are playing a game with your friend Lucy.

Although it is a simple game, it plays with the idea of a different planet in a different universe, the existence of a multiverse, and our very own existence.

Stick until the end and you will understand what I’m talking about.

There are 5 ranked levels, access the ranking in the link below. https://globalstats.io/leaderboard/5f8e0f045f5e88cc018b484a

Soundtrack: Khun, Les Saintes Glaces

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/ZUHN/les_saintes_glaces

My lessons learned:

  • The game will not be perfect (in fact there is a high possibility it will be a complete piece of shit)
  • Completing a game is rewarding. There is a feel of accomplishment (even though no one may like it)
  • All ideas seem fun in your own head
  • Invest more time in level design than in trying to make it look pretty
  • Don't sleep in geometry classes
  • Game jams really are great for learning
  • Sometimes your teammates will be unable to help, enjoy that to learn more and gain more XP
  • Can't wait to join the next one
